ygData.subject: RE: [eqenchanters] Mesmerisation
ygData.msgSnippet: You just witnessed a shining example of what makes enchanters indispensible to any well-rounded party. Had you been ANY other class, everyone in your party
ygData.messageBody:
You just witnessed a shining example of what makes enchanters indispensible
to any well-rounded party. Had you been ANY other class, everyone in your
party would have been faced with a difficult corpse retrieval.

> -----Original Message-----
> From: eqcariel@... [SMTP:eqcariel@...]
> Sent: Monday, March 20, 2000 5:51 PM
> To: eqenchanters@onelist.com
> Subject: Re: [eqenchanters] Mesmerisation
>
> From: eqcariel@...
>
> I use this one occasionally depending on where I am and what is being
> pulled.
> Recently we had a goblin get away from us in Solusek. (We had two not
> quite
> full groups in the area of the Foreman/Predetor between levels of 24 and
> 31)
> So as soon as the one got away I memorized Mesmerisation.
>
> And boy was I glad that I did.
>
> With the number of people there and the goblin finding well over a dozen
> buddies to bring back to the Foreman room there would have been no way to
> effectively enthrall each individual one knowing that it was kind of a
> free
> for all in killing them all off. I was able to mesmerize most of them and
> I
> did it a few times as they killed everything off. And I was standing in
> the
> corner farthest from the one I had targeted so I only accidentally
> mesmerized
> myself once.
>
> Never seen anything like that and live to tell about it : )
>
> Cariel
> Enchanter, 31st level
> Fennin Ro
>
